Text: REThanks John How do I become a part of ENA Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday November AM To Khanna Sanjeev Cc Vu Steven Nguyen Michael Tawney Mark Zipper Andy Subject A broker just sent me this today I am going to talk to him to get the details after trading Thought you would like to know Thanks John Here is the announcement Reliant Energy Weather Risk Management Group has developed Weathersensitive Gas Load Indices WGLI indices that measure national or regional residential and commercial gas consumption during the heating season We believe the indices will provide valuable information for gas traders as well as other market participants We plan to make a swap market in the indices in the near future We hope the WGLI swaps will become a new financial tool to help you or your clients to better manage their risks associated with the fluctuation of gas demand
